test.query: SELECT CounterID, EventDate FROM hits_100m_single ORDER BY CounterID, exp(CounterID), sqrt(CounterID) FORMAT Null
SELECT CounterID, EventDate FROM hits_100m_single ORDER BY CounterID, EventDate, exp(CounterID), toDateTime(EventDate) FORMAT Null
SELECT CounterID, EventDate FROM hits_100m_single ORDER BY CounterID DESC, EventDate DESC, exp(CounterID), toDateTime(EventDate) FORMAT Null
